items.item_details:
Background and Analysis:
	 
The subcommittee for the 2014-2015 Citizens' Bond Oversight Committee Annual Report has met and worked with staff to prepare a draft Annual Report for review. The draft is ready for final review and approval by the Citizens' Bond Oversight Committee.
	 
http://measurec.fhda.edu/AR1415/
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Mike Chegini
Additional contact names:
 Steve Kitchen, Executive Director, Facilities & Operations, x6150
Is backup provided?
 No
items.item_recommendation: Approve the 2014-2015 Measure C Annual Report as presented.
items.item_text: Review and approve the 2014-2015 Measure C Annual Report
